caption: The video depicts a man meeting a waitress in a bar, then returning to a hotel and having an altercation with his wife, ultimately leading to an accidental murder. He seeks the assistance of Mr. Holmes, but Mr. Holmes seems disinterested in the case and is instead fixated on a stolen human head from a hospital, studying the coagulation of saliva after death. Additionally, the video highlights Mr. Holmes' ignorance on some basic facts, such as the Earth orbiting the Sun. Highlights include: A man meets a waitress in a bar, returns to a hotel, has an altercation with his wife, leading to an accidental murder; he seeks Mr. Holmes' help, but Mr. Holmes seems uninterested; Mr. Holmes is fixated on a stolen human head, studying post-mortem saliva coagulation; Mr. Holmes displays ignorance on basic facts like the Earth's orbit around the Sun; Mr. Holmes believes storing useful things in the 'hard drive' is meaningful; Mr. Holmes is uninterested in the man's murder case, viewing it as a straightforward domestic homicide; Mr. Holmes believes the man should step up and admit his crime; the man insists he killed his wife unintentionally and seeks Mr. Holmes' aid; Mr. Holmes looks down on the man's actions, viewing him as less of a real man; the video showcases Mr. Holmes' fascination with peculiar cases and his ignorance on common knowledge.
